amendment.description: To authorize, and authorize the appropriation of, $5,500,000 for military construction at F.E. Warren Air Force Base, Wyoming, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3433 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3433 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To authorize, and authorize the appropriation of, $5,500,000 for military construction at F.E. Warren Air Force Base, Wyoming, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3433 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3433 proposed by Senator Warner.
